items.name: VANS OG AUTHENTIC LX
items.description: Vans Authentic shoes were first manufactured in 1966. They were designed by Paul Van Doren, founder of the company, and today they are extremely popular in skateboarding culture. The Vans Authentic Women's range are available in a variety of different patterns and colourways.

items.name: VANS OG STYLE 138 LX
items.description: The Vans Style 138 sneakers are a re-introduced model of one of the most legendary Vans silhouettes. Check them out at Footshop.

items.name: ADIDAS U_PATH X W
items.description: Upper - Textile ▩ - is a lightweight material, which is offered in a very wide color scale and is mainly used for summer footwear.

items.name: CHAMPION HOODIE
items.description: Composition - 100% Cotton - A very soft and pleasant material whose properties include tensile strength and elongation at break. Unlike other materials, it does not get damaged easily when washed often.

items.name: ADIDAS HOODIE
items.description: Just a little something extra. Sometimes that's all you need, and this adidas hoodie delivers with ruffles popping off the sleeves. Soft French terry means that wherever you are, you can really relax in total comfort. Because when you feel good, you look good. So throw on this sweatshirt and do both..

items.name: VANS 66 SUPPLY HOODIE
items.description: 76% Cotton - A very soft and pleasant material whose properties include tensile strength and elongation at break. Unlike other materials, it does not get damaged easily when washed often.24% Polyester - a very strong synthetic fiber that boasts high heat resistance and excellent odor absorption

hoodies.name: Hoodies

items.name: HOPE KRISSY TROUSERS
items.description: Composition - Viscose - the look is similar to cotton and is equally comfortable to touch, but the cotton is different with its better heat conducting properties.

items.name: SELECTED CROPPED TROUSERS
items.description: 32% Viscose - the look is similar to cotton and is equally comfortable to touch, but the cotton is different with its better heat conducting properties.4% Elastane - used in combination with other materials, especially for its excellent flexibility - its fiber can stretch up to three times its normal length and then return to its original state.64% Polyester - a very strong synthetic fiber that boasts high heat resistance and excellent odor absorption

pants.description: Steal that Steve Jobs or Mark Zuckerberg look!

items.name: HELLY HANSEN W ARYA PARKA
items.description: Outer material - 100% Polyester, Filling material - 100% Polyester

items.name: ADIDAS MYSHELTER COLD RDY
items.description: Whether you're grabbing food in Chinatown or bar hopping in Brooklyn, the last thing you want to worry about is getting cold. Enter the MYSHELTER COLD.RDY Parka. The adidas insulating technology of overlapping sections of HyperDRY™ Down keep the warmth in and the cold out. Internal carry straps for when you head indoors, weatherproof vest for when you've got no option but to hit the streets.
